TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenHandler extends System.Object implements class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.ICustomIdentityConfiguration
Public MustInherit Class SecurityTokenHandler Implements ICustomIdentityConfiguration

summary.span: 安全标记处理程序的抽象基类。

span.span: The abstract base class for security token handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是所有安全标记处理程序都从中派生的基类。The class is the base class from which all security token handlers derive. 安全令牌处理程序负责：A security token handler is responsible for: - 验证安全令牌 ( 其设计用于处理令牌中包含的声明并将其打包到对象的类型) 。Validating security tokens () of the type it is designed to process and packaging the claims contained in the token into a object. - 序列化和反序列化其设计为处理的类型的安全令牌。Serializing and deserializing security tokens of the type it is designed to process. - 序列化和反序列化密钥标识符子句 () ，这些子句引用其设计用于处理到元素和从元素处理的类型的标记 `` 。Serializing and deserializing key identifier clauses () that refer to tokens of the type it is designed to process to and from `` elements. - 从 类的实现所传递的对象创建安全令牌 。Creating security tokens from a object passed by implementations of the class. - 为类的实现创建安全令牌中的密钥标识符子句 。Creating key identifier clauses from a security token for implementations of the class. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供了以下安全令牌处理程序：Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) ships the following security token handlers out of the box: - - - - - - - - - - - 其中的大多数类公开其他成员，这些成员实现特定于对其设计类的标记的处理的功能。Most of these classes expose additional members that implement functionality that is specific to the processing of the tokens for which the class is designed. 在许多情况下，从这些类中的一个派生，而不是直接从类派生可能更好 。In many cases it may be better to derive from one of these classes rather than directly from the class. 可以通过在配置文件中的[ < securityTokenHandlers > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers)元素下指定[ < add > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add)、 [ < remove > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove)或[ < clear > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear)元素，在令牌处理程序集合中添加或删除安全令牌处理程序。A security token handler can be added or removed from a token handler collection by specifying the [<add>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/add), [<remove>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/remove), or [<clear>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/clear) elements under the [<securityTokenHandlers>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlers) element in a configuration file. 可以通过属性访问包含处理程序集合的配置设置的对象 ，并且可以从属性访问标记处理程序可以访问的处理程序集合 。The object that contains the configuration settings for the handler collection can be accessed through the property and the handler collection that the token handler is a member of can be accessed from the property. 可以重写 方法，以处理处理程序所采用的任何自定义配置元素。You can override the method to process any custom configuration elements that your handler takes. 类公开几个其他属性和方法。The class exposes several other properties and methods. 根据你选择实现的功能，你可以重写部分或全部成员。Depending on the functionality that you choose to implement, you may override some or all of these members. 必须重写 属性和方法， 以提供 WIF 基础结构，其中包含有关类用于处理的安全令牌类型的信息。You must override the property and the method to provide the WIF infrastructure with information about the type of security token that your class is designed to process. 验证、序列化和反序列化功能是通过属性或方法公开的，这些属性或方法指示处理程序是否可以执行与方法或实现该功能的方法组合在一起的特定函数。Validation, serialization, and deserialization functionality is exposed through properties or methods that indicate whether the handler can perform a specific function combined with the method or methods that implement the functionality. 下面的列表对用来实现该功能的方法指示功能的属性或方法进行了配对：The following list pairs the properties or methods that indicate functionality with the methods that implement that functionality: - 属性和 方法：验证令牌并将令牌中包含的声明打包到中 。The property and the method: Validates a token and packages the claims contained in the token into a . - 属性和 方法：标记序列化。The property and the methods: Token serialization. - 方法和 方法：标记反序列化。The methods and the methods: Token deserialization. - 方法和 方法：反序列化密钥标识符子句。The method and the method: Deserializing key identifier clauses. - 方法和 方法：序列化密钥标识符子句。The method and the method: Serializing key identifier clauses. 和 方法是在类的实现中从管道调用的 。The and the methods are called from the pipeline in implementations of the class. 方法由 WIF 基础结构调用，以确定是否已接收到指定的令牌。The method is called by the WIF infrastructure to determine whether the specified token has already been received. 默认情况下，此方法返回 `false` ，这表示尚未收到标记。By default this method returns `false`, which indicates that the token has not already been received. 可以重写方法，并提供用于检测重播标记的逻辑。You can override the method and provide logic to detect replayed tokens. ## Examples 所有主题中的代码示例 都是从示例中获取的 `Custom Token` 。The code examples in all of the topics are taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记 (SWT) 。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). 下面的 XML 演示如何将 SWT 标记处理程序添加到令牌处理程序集合。The following XML shows how to add the SWT token handler to the token handlers collection. ```xml ```

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause (System.Xml.XmlReader reader);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CanReadKeyIdentifierClause (reader As XmlReader) As Boolean
public: virtual bool CanReadKeyIdentifierClause(System::Xml::XmlReader ^ reader);
abstract member CanReadKeyIdentifierClause : System.Xml.XmlReader -> bool override this.CanReadKeyIdentifierClause : System.Xml.XmlReader -> bool

param.name: reader
param.span: 在开始元素上指定的 XML 读取器。

span.span: An XML reader positioned at the start element.

param.span: 不能通过这种方法读取器前移。

span.span: The reader should not be advanced by this method.

summary.span: 返回指示由指定 XML 读取器引用的 XML 元素是否为由此实例反序列化的关键标识符子句的值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the XML element referred to by the specified XML reader is a key identifier clause that can be deserialized by this instance.

returns.span: 如果 方法可读取元素，则为 ；否则，为 。

span.span: if the method can read the element; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现返回 `false` 以指示无法读取密钥标识符子句。The default implementation returns `false` to indicate that the key identifier clause cannot be read. 派生类检查读取器所引用的元素，以便确定该实例是否可以反序列化密钥标识符子句。A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a key identifier clause. 通常通过调用方法来完成此操作， 并指定相应的元素和命名空间字符串。This is typically accomplished through a call to the method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified. 如果重写 ，还必须重写 方法以提供反序列化密钥标识符子句的逻辑。If you override , you must also override the method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause.

summary.span: 返回指示指定标记是否可以作为由此实例处理类型标记的反序列化的值。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the specified token can be deserialized as a token of the type processed by this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现始终返回 `false`。The default implementation always returns `false`. 派生类检查读取器所引用的元素，以便确定该实例是否可以反序列化安全令牌。A derived class checks the element that the reader is referring to in order to determine whether the instance can deserialize a security token. 通常通过调用方法来完成此操作， 并指定相应的元素和命名空间字符串。This is typically accomplished through a call to the method with the appropriate element and namespace strings specified. 如果重写 ，还必须重写 方法或方法， 以提供反序列化密钥标识符子句的逻辑。If you override , you must also override the method or the method to provide the logic to deserialize the key identifier clause. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写 方法，以确定处理程序是否可以读取标记。The following code shows how to override the method to determine whether a token can be read by a handler. 此代码取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记 (SWT) 。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在派生类中实现验证，请重写此属性以返回 `true` ，并重写 方法以实现验证逻辑。To implement validation in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the method to implement the validation logic. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写 属性，以指示自定义处理程序可以验证令牌。The following code shows how to override the property to indicate that a custom handler can validate tokens. 此代码取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记 (SWT) 。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在派生类中实现序列化，请重写此属性以返回 `true` 并重写 方法以实现序列化逻辑。To implement serialization in a derived class, override this property to return `true` and override the methods to implement the serialization logic. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写 属性，以指示自定义处理程序可以对标记进行序列化。The following code shows how to override the property to indicate that a custom handler can serialize tokens. 此代码取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记 (SWT) 。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). summary.span: 获取或设置提供配置当前实例的 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that provides configuration for the current instance.

value.span: 对当前实例的配置对象。

span.span: The configuration object for the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 应用程序启动期间，属性通常由配置基础结构从配置文件中的[ < securityTokenHandlerConfiguration > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration)元素设置。The property is typically set by the configuration infrastructure from the [<securityTokenHandlerConfiguration>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/securitytokenhandlerconfiguration) element in the configuration file during application start up. 在派生类中，你可以使用 属性来访问配置设置; 例如， 可以从配置对象的属性访问要在方法中使用的颁发者名称注册表 。In derived classes, you use the property to access configuration settings; for example, the issuer name registry to use in the method can be accessed from the property of the configuration object.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause CreateSecurityTokenReference (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, bool attached);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause CreateSecurityTokenReference(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, bool attached) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateSecurityTokenReference (token As SecurityToken, attached As Boolean) As SecurityKeyIdentifierClause
public: virtual System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityKeyIdentifierClause ^ CreateSecurityTokenReference(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ token, bool attached);

abstract member CreateSecurityTokenReference : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken * bool -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause override this.CreateSecurityTokenReference : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken * bool -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause

param.name: token
param.span: 创建引用的标记。

span.span: The token for which the reference is to be created.

param.name: attached
param.span: 如果应创建附加引用，则为 ；如果应创建独立的引用，则为 。

span.span: if an attached reference should be created; if an unattached reference should be created.

summary.span: 当在派生类中重写，为该类处理的标记创建安全标记引用。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates the security token reference for tokens processed by that class.

summary.span: 通常通过安全标记服务 (STS) 调用此方法。

span.span: This method is typically called by a security token service (STS).

returns.span: 一个密钥标识符字句，该字句引用指定的令牌。

span.span: A key identifier clause that references the specified token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将引发 异常。By default this method throws a exception. 派生类重写此方法以返回密钥标识符子句 () ，该子句可用于为 `` 指定的标记创建元素。Derived classes override this method to return a key identifier clause () that can be used to create a `` element for the specified token. 从类的实现调用 。Called from implementations of the class. 通常，除了 创建自定义 security token service 之外，不需要使用。Typically, a does not need to be used, other than when a custom security token service is created. 当安全令牌服务返回安全令牌时，已颁发的安全令牌包含对附加的和未附加的安全令牌的引用。When a security token service returns a security token, the issued security token contains references to attached and unattached security tokens. 附加引用所引用的是包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头中的安全令牌，而未附加引用则引用未包含在 SOAP 消息的安全标头中的安全令牌。Attached references refer to security tokens that are contained within the security header of a SOAP message and unattached references reference security tokens that are not included within the security header of a SOAP message. 这些引用通常确认已颁发的安全令牌的真实性。These references typically affirm the authenticity of the issued security token. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写 方法，以便从指定的令牌创建密钥标识符子句。The following code shows how to override the method to create a key identifier clause from the specified token. 此代码取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记 (SWT) 。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). [!code-csharp[WifRcCustomToken#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/wifrccustomtoken/cs/simplewebtoken/simplewebtokenhandler.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken CreateToken (System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor tokenDescriptor);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken CreateToken(class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor tokenDescriptor) cil managed
Public Overridable Function CreateToken (tokenDescriptor As SecurityTokenDescriptor) As SecurityToken
public: virtual System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ CreateToken(System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityTokenDescriptor ^ tokenDescriptor);

abstract member CreateToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken override this.CreateToken : System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenDescriptor -> System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken

param.name: tokenDescriptor
param.span: 令牌从其生成的安全令牌说明符。

span.span: The security token descriptor from which the token is to be created.

param.span: 在调用该方法之前设置标记说明符的属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认实现不执行任何操作。The default implementation does nothing. 如果已使用了标记，派生类应引发 。Derived classes should throw a if the token has already been used. Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 提供可从中 派生重播缓存的类，以及可用于在应用程序中配置标记处理程序所使用的重播缓存的[ < tokenReplayCache > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache)配置元素; 但是，该方法的精确实现 取决于派生类的设计器。Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) provides the class from which replay caches may be derived and the [<tokenReplayCache>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/tokenreplaycache) configuration element, which can be used to configure the replay cache used by token handlers in an application; however, the exact implementation of the method is up to the designer of the derived class.

The identities contained in the token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将引发 异常。By default this method throws a exception. 此 方法由基础结构调用，用于验证和提取反序列化安全令牌中的声明。The method is called by the infrastructure to validate and extract the claims from the deserialized security token. 这些声明在方法返回的对象集合中返回 。These claims are returned in the collection of objects returned by the method. 在典型情况下，此集合将包含单个标识。In the typical case, this collection will contain a single identity. 在派生类中，验证通常包括根据在 属性中指定的令牌处理程序配置对象的属性中指定的受众 uri 验证令牌中指定的目标受众 。In derived classes, validation typically includes validating the intended audience specified in the token against the audience URIs specified in the property of the token handler configuration object specified on the property. 这些 Uri 通常在配置文件中的[ < audienceUris > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris)元素下设置。These URIs are typically set in the configuration file under the [<audienceUris>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/audienceuris) element. 如果无法验证受众，则 应引发异常。If the audience cannot be validated, an exception should be thrown. 处理令牌时，通常通过将颁发者令牌传递给 通过属性为处理程序配置的对象上的方法之一来验证颁发者 。When processing the token, the issuer is typically validated by passing the issuer token to one of the methods on the object that is configured for the handler through the property. 颁发者名称注册表通常通过配置文件中的[ < issuerNameRegistry > ](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry)元素进行配置。The issuer name registry is typically configured through the [<issuerNameRegistry>](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/windows-identity-foundation/issuernameregistry) element in the configuration file. 返回颁发者的名称。The returns the name of the issuer. 此名称应用于设置 令牌中包含的声明中的属性。This name should be used to set the property in claims contained in the token. 如果颁发者名称注册表不包含颁发者令牌的条目，则 返回 `null` 。If the issuer name registry does not contain an entry for the issuer token, returns `null`. 在这种情况下 ，通常是在派生类中引发的，但此行为由类的设计器引发。In this case a is typically thrown in derived classes, but this behavior is up to the designer of the class. ## Examples 下面的代码演示了一个 安全令牌处理程序方法的重写，该方法用于处理简单的 web 令牌 (SWT) 。The following code shows an override of the method for a security token handler that processes simple web tokens (SWT). 此代码取自 `CustomToken` 示例。The code is taken from the `CustomToken` sample. 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index). remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将引发 异常。By default this method throws a exception. 重写此方法以提供将密钥标识符子句序列化为 XML 的逻辑。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a key identifier clause to XML. 如果重写此方法，则还应重写 方法。If you override this method, you should also override the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，此方法将引发 异常。By default this method throws a exception. 重写此方法以提供将安全令牌序列化为 XML 的逻辑。Override this method to provide the logic to serialize a security token to XML. 如果重写此方法，则还应重写 属性。If you override this method, you should also override the property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何重写 方法以序列化自定义标记。The following code shows how to override the method to serialize a custom token. 此代码取自 `Custom Token` 示例。The code is taken from the `Custom Token` sample. 此示例提供了自定义类，这些类可用于处理简单 Web 标记 (SWT) 。This sample provides custom classes that enable processing of Simple Web Tokens (SWT). 有关此示例和可供 WIF 使用的其他示例和下载位置的详细信息，请参阅 [WIF 代码示例索引](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index)。For information about this sample and other samples available for WIF and where to download them, see [WIF Code Sample Index](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/framework/security/wif-code-sample-index).
